amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding for the Bureau of Reclamation's Policy and Administration to Fiscal Year 2022.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Bureau of Reclamation's Policy and Administration to FY22.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 213 (Roll no. 531).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 213 (Roll no. 531).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
